assertion.label: Change Details
assertion.name: change_details
assertion.value: The supplementary file of the article contained some track changes. This has been replaced with a clean version.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000. Approval to conduct this human subject research was obtained by the Medical University of South Carolina institutional review board.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
